name: kanban-ai
description: A monorepo template built with Bun, Hono, Vite, and React
author: Steve Simkins

scripts.build:prod: bun run scripts/build-migration-data.ts && bun run build:client && bun run build:server && bun run scripts/copy-static.ts && bun run scripts/build-static-bundle.ts
scripts.build:binary: bun run build:prod && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 server/dist/src/entry/prod.js --outfile dist/kanban-ai-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 server/dist/src/entry/prod.js --outfile dist/kanban-ai-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 server/dist/src/entry/prod.js --outfile dist/kanban-ai-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 server/dist/src/entry/prod.js --outfile dist/kanban-ai-win-x64
scripts.prod: bun run build:prod && bun run server/dist/src/entry/prod.js
